nodes.text: TK-8H2 was a stormtrooper for the Galactic Empire. In 1 ABY, TK-8H2 was stationed in the Theed Royal Palace, alongside Nial Declann and another stormtrooper, designated TK-9H4.
TK-8H2 is a non-player character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, the stormtrooper simply guards Nial Declann.
